title: Under That Rock
description: Looking under rocks can lead to all kinds of discoveries! Under That Rock introduces readers to a small world of living things. The book can also be used to teach students about sequencing events and identifying adjectives.
meta: grub, silky, slow, smooth, surprises, wiggly
Initial Blends : Discriminate initial consonant sp- and sn- blends
Consonant Blends : Identify and categorize initial consonant sp- and sn- blends
Concept Words : Identify and use position words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
